text: <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> <#C22PU4LV8|general> - has anyone had any luck just changing the report templates in HubSpot? Looking to either expand the column widths, trim the padding, allow for text wrapping - or maybe even all of the above!

#<#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> Hello, I'd like to know if there is a way to disable a Select component based on a condition.
Ref: (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/ui-components/standard-components/select>)
Thanks in advance
